name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draftboard Intros - Map Your Network To Find Warm Intros

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly turn your network into your biggest asset, and leverage it to help your business - and others’ - grow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your network is a goldmine, but you don’t have the tools to mine it. 

Until now.

Draftboard maps your network to find warm intros to the people you want to reach. 

- Are you a founder looking to fully leverage your network for sales, but finding it too tedious & manual?
- Are you a salesperson who is sick of accepting that 1% reply rates are “the norm”?
- Are you a connector who wants to leverage your connections to help others?

Draftboard’s new extension gives you a huge leg up - simply set it and forget it (i.e. install it and that’s it). We’ll map your professional network and notify you when we find a match.

*So what exactly is Draftboard?*

Draftboard started as a referral platform for jobs, but is expanding aggressively into new product lines - like warm intros.

We’ve raised over $4M from top-tier investors, and have incredible companies like SeatGeek, Bilt Rewards, Formlabs, Via and 100+ others using other other products. 

Have any feedback? Send us an email at info@draftboard.com

—-

By using the Draftboard browser extension, you agree to Draftboard’s terms and conditions. (https://www.draftboard.com/intros/terms-of-use)
